Player History
Drafted in 21st round, 327th overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/19/2015, off Clark Staggs (DET)...
Traded from Colorado to Chicago on 4/21/2017 (Going to CHI: 1B Manuel Volpe. Going to COL: P Edson Villamil)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/9/2017, off Anthony Cassano (SEA)...
Was claimed off waivers by Philadelphia on 2/21/2018.
Injured on 5/23/2018 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
